meanings.sent1: After careful thought, the redetermination of the winner was announced.
meanings.sent2: The redetermination of the route led us to a quicker path.
meanings.sent3: The redetermination of the puzzle made everyone laugh at the mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her redetermination to succeed was like a bright light guiding her way.
meanings.sent5: The redetermination of the rules made the game more exciting.

meanings.definition: The process of reevaluating or reassessing something.
meanings.sent1: The redetermination of the budget was necessary for financial stability.
meanings.sent2: Through redetermination, they found a better solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: His redetermination of his wardrobe choices was quite amusing to his friends.
meanings.sent4: The redetermination of her goals was like a fresh start in life.
meanings.sent5: With redetermination, they were able to improve their performance.
